spells.name: Burning Gaze
spells.description: Inflict 1d6 fire damage to creature by looking at it.

spells.name: Feast of Ashes
spells.description: A target starves with an insatiable hunger.

spells.name: Fester
spells.description: Gives subject SR 12 + your level vs. healing effects.

spells.name: Glide
spells.description: You take no falling damage and move 60 ft./round while falling.

spells.name: Hidden Speech
spells.description: Gain +10 on Bluff to send secret messages.

spells.name: Pox Pustules
spells.description: Subject is sickened and has -4 Dex.

spells.name: Vomit Swarm
spells.description: Produces a spider swarm that fights for you.
